nodes.text: Rebels United is an excerpt of A New Dawn that appeared in Star Wars Insider 152. As an excerpt from the book, which itself was released on September 2, 2014, it was written by John Jackson Miller. The excerpt involves a confrontation between Imperial Navy Captain Rae Sloane and Star Wars Rebels characters Kanan Jarrus and Hera Syndulla, the latter of whom fight to escape from Imperial custody.
